59 class ConcaveShape : public CollisionShape {
60 
61  protected :
62 
63  // -------------------- Attributes -------------------- //
64 
66  TriangleRaycastSide mRaycastTestType;
67 
68  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
69 
71  virtual bool testPointInside(const Vector3& localPoint, ProxyShape* proxyShape) const override;
72 
73  public :
74 
75  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
76 
78  ConcaveShape(CollisionShapeName name);
79 
81  virtual ~ConcaveShape() override = default;
82 
84  ConcaveShape(const ConcaveShape& shape) = delete;
85 
87  ConcaveShape& operator=(const ConcaveShape& shape) = delete;
88 
90  TriangleRaycastSide getRaycastTestType() const;
91 
92  // Set the raycast test type (front, back, front-back)
93  void setRaycastTestType(TriangleRaycastSide testType);
94 
96  virtual bool isConvex() const override;
97 
99  virtual bool isPolyhedron() const override;
100 
102  virtual void testAllTriangles(TriangleCallback& callback, const AABB& localAABB) const=0;
103 };
104 
105 // Return true if the collision shape is convex, false if it is concave
106 inline bool ConcaveShape::isConvex() const {
107  return false;
108 }
109 
110 // Return true if the collision shape is a polyhedron
111 inline bool ConcaveShape::isPolyhedron() const {
112  return true;
113 }
114 
115 // Return true if a point is inside the collision shape
116 inline bool ConcaveShape::testPointInside(const Vector3& localPoint, ProxyShape* proxyShape) const {
117  return false;
118 }
119 
120 // Return the raycast test type (front, back, front-back)
121 inline TriangleRaycastSide ConcaveShape::getRaycastTestType() const {
122  return mRaycastTestType;
123 }
124 
125 // Set the raycast test type (front, back, front-back)
129 inline void ConcaveShape::setRaycastTestType(TriangleRaycastSide testType) {
130  mRaycastTestType = testType;
131 }
132 
133 }
